classification.task_goal: Fix the bug in the custom Android soft keyboard app related to the SeekBar resizing the keyboard.
primary_constraints: The keyboard must reposition to the bottom of the screen when resized using the SeekBar.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially failed to provide a solution that ensured the keyboard repositioned correctly on the first use of the SeekBar, which violated the primary constraint. However, the user engaged with the AI to clarify the issue and received a solution that involved posting a runnable to ensure the layout was updated correctly, thus repairing the violation.
